comments.body: What's the reason of these performance gains? The version upgrade or `ZstdInputStreamNoFinalizer`?

It's purely `ZstdInputStreamNoFinalizer` and `ZstdOutputStreamNoFinalizer`.
`1.4.8-7` is only making them `public`.
- https://github.com/luben/zstd-jni/commit/57d53a09d247bcdb581d35dfec23a20b0661b86a

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +7,11 @@Benchmark ZStandardCompressionCodec:                    Best Time(ms)   Avg Time(ms)   Stdev(ms)    Rate(M/s)   Per Row(ns)   Relative
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compression 10000 times at level 1 without buffer pool            800            801           1          0.0       80017.0       1.0X
Compression 10000 times at level 2 without buffer pool            703            704           1          0.0       70331.6       1.1X
Compression 10000 times at level 3 without buffer pool            935            938           5          0.0       93488.6       0.9X
